summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Monday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 6
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Monday, with seven gaining and the other 12 declining.
Bitcoin fell 0.3% to $22,418 by market close.
